Characteristics[ReductionReagent]: reduced with 10 mM dithiothreitol at 56 °C for 30 min
Characteristics[AlkylationReagent]: alkylated with 10 mM iodoacetamide at room temperature in the dark for additional 30 min
Characteristics[NumberOfBiologicalReplic: 84 diffuse-type tumors (T) together with their matching nearby tissues (N)
Comment[GradientTime]: 75 min high-performance liquid chromatography gradient at low pH.
Comment[Separation]: separated at high pH with small columns packed in pipette tips (sRP)
Comment[PrecursorMassTolerance]: 20 ppm for precursor and 50 mmu for product ions
20 ppm for precursor and 0.5 Da for product ions
Comment[NumberOfMissedCleavages]: Up to two missed cleavages were allowed.
